snippet: Rex Ryan’s most glaring deficiency: How can he claim to have a firm command of his team if he too often doesn’t have control of himself?
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Football considers whether the brash style of New York Jets coach Rex Ryan led to disunity of an 8-8 Jets team that sagged and collapsed under the weight of its own sloppy disposition--a disposition that most accurately reflected its unconventional-to-a-fault head coach.
lead_paragraph: Rex Ryan’s most glaring deficiency: How can he claim to have a firm command of his team if he too often doesn’t have control of himself?

headline.seo: On Pro Football: Ryan’s Lack of Control Led to Jets’ Downfall
headline.main: Ryan’s Lack of Control Led to Fall
